name: Help Sputnik Get to Space!
description:
Sputnik is a sewer creature with dreams of reaching the cosmos.
It is up to you to help him get there!

_________________________________________________

Help Sputnik Get to Space is an infinite runner designed primarily for android devices. It is the result of a final group project in a 200 level games course.
